item.title: This is such a good reminder of how we can be consumed.
item.description:
This is such a good reminder of how we can be consumed.

An Arctic inhabitant is fascinated by the sudden appearance of a mysterious box. Kevin Parry - Director / Animator http://www.kevinbparry.com Ihor Dawidiuk - Musical Score http://www.ihordawidiuk.com Tim Burton's Reaction http://vimeo.com/17229245 Youtube link @ http://youtu.be/-PF8lJ00NGQ

item.title: Time to eat, and eat smartly.
item.description:
Time to eat, and eat smartly.

The foods readily available 35 years from now won't look like the foods available today. Some of what we're used to eating will be in short supply-and that new diet could cause an extra 500,000 deaths a year.

item.title: Portal vs Half-Life
item.description:
Portal vs Half-Life

Portal vs Half-Life T SHIRTS: http://goo.gl/7QH3dT Chell and Gordon fight for some cake. No lie. FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/andrewmfilms/ TWITTER: https://twitter.com/andrewmfilms INSTA: https://www.instagram.com/andrewmfilms/ Sound/music: Matthew McMurry (https://soundcloud.com/matthewmcmurry) Starring Seth McMurry (http://instagram.com/sethmcmurry) and Cymber Browder (https://www.instagram.com/cymberb/) Written/Direction/Visual FX by Andrew McMurry Props by https://www.facebook.com/SlaydogProps/

item.title: My dream menu. Why am I so hungry?
item.description:
My dream menu. Why am I so hungry?

Alright. You're about to witness something that nobody has seen. We mean it. A few days ago we got the exclusive opportunity to travel to the Carl's Jr. headquarters and eat a shiz ton of their food. Not just any food, however. We taste-tested eight insane menu items that have not yet been released to the public.

item.title: Wintergatan - Marble Machine (music instrument using 2000 marbles)
item.description:
Wintergatan - Marble Machine (music instrument using 2000 marbles)

I could watch this for hours. It makes me want to watch Mirror Mask again. Not sure why... I guess Ill watch it tonight.

item.title: The Fallen of World War II
item.description:
The Fallen of World War II

This is sobering. They say that history repeats itself. I pray, for the sake of our children, that these numbers are forever left in the past.

item.title: DARTH MAUL: Apprentice - A Star Wars Fan-Film
item.description:
DARTH MAUL: Apprentice - A Star Wars Fan-Film

I'm so happy to present to you our Star Wars Darth Maul Fan-Film!!! #DMApprentice Hope you like it!!! :) MAKING OF: http://bit.ly/1QFMYTB Subscribe to us: http://bit.ly/QFLOui We worked incredibly hard on this film for almost 2 years! We always felt that Darth Maul should have had more screen time.
